title: The Dangerous Idea of “Pseudo-Intellectuals”
description:

The term "pseudointellectual" has been thrown around a whole lot these days. It has been used to describe public figures like Jordan Peterson and Noam Chomsky. But despite this, we do not have a very good definition of what a pseudointellectual is. So let's consider how to pin down this difficult and nebulous concept.
